oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Hartford Live in Concert - 1979-11-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from John Hartford's (musician) live performance at WHN Studios. The performance was on November 15, 1979. The tape was created by the WHN radio network.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: John Hartford
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) The Wart (John Hartford) -- (03:15) Mississippi Dew (John Hartford) -- (08:17) Hartford introduces his band -- (08:42) Miss Ferris (John Hartford) -- (15:16) Gentle on My Mind (John Hartford) -- (19:24) In Tall Buildings (John Hartford) -- (22:26) Unidentified guitar tune (John Hartford)-- (25:23) Long Hot Summer Days (John Hartford) -- (30:03) Orange Blossom Special (John Hartford) -- (36:06) Unidentified vocal tune (John Hartford) -- (38:22) Unidentified guitar tune (John Hartford) -- (40:14) Don't Leave Your Records in the Sun (John Hartford) -- (42:45) Up on the Hill Where They do the Boogie (John Hartford) -- (46:39) Cuckoo's Nest (John Hartford) -- (48:21) Steamboat Whistle Blues (John Hartford) -- (50:29) Slumberin' on the Cumberland (John Hartford) -- (57:42) Incoherent background chatter -- (58:13) Roll in My Sweet Baby's Arms [incomplete] (John Hartford)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hartford, John;
